GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Raffish hairstyle aside, I am in fact a
doctor. <sp:5:0:0>Really! I'll prove it by teaching
you how to make elixirs.
The explanation is rather long, so you may
want to write it down. <sp:5:0:0>*ahem*

Step one—<sp:5:0:0>simmer <clr:0000>bugs <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>monster parts<clr:ffff>
in a <clr:0000>pot<clr:ffff>.

Oh... That's it. <sp:5:1:0>Didn't take as long as
I was expecting.

<snd:Happy>You can yield different medicines
depending on the ingredients' properties,
so please, experiment at will!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>We're close now—<sp:5:0:0>very near the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
But I think perhaps I won't go closer.

I'd hate to get hurt and bring my travels
to a premature end.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Among all the <clr:0000>fallen ruins <clr:ffff>here in the
<clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>, there's said to be a
structure big enough to walk around in.
The trick would be knowing how to get
inside... Which I don't.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>A number of <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> fell from the sky and
landed here in the <clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>.

They range from small fragments to huge
pieces of debris. I hear you can even go
inside one of them!
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Intrigued as I am, I'm not sure I'd know
how to enter an ancient <clr:0000>ruin<clr:ffff>.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Everyone's talking about the <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>that
was found on <clr:0000>Mercay Island<clr:ffff>.

I would love to go, but...<sp:5:1:0>it's sure to be
quite the health hazard.
Comment_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_00>I know you... <sp:5:0:0>We met that one time,
didn't we?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know. <sp:5:0:0>After my interview with <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>
for the <clr:0000>chasm researcher position<clr:ffff>.

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>When I walked away a miserable failure...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>


Quite a tough interviewer, Josha was.
I doubt even the most gifted scientific
mind could have held up to her scrutiny.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You may look at me and think, <sp:5:0:0>"That
man is not a doctor." <sp:5:0:0>But in fact, that is
precisely my vocation.
And being somewhat not-young, I feel an
urgency to make a lasting mark on the
profession before my sunset years.
That was why I volunteered for the
<clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team<clr:ffff>.

You see, I believe that new elixirs and
remedies might be derived from the <clr:0000>plant
and animal life <clr:ffff>found in <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>That's why I'm here. This is my chance to
be on the ground floor of the new field of
chasm medicine!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:TalkPositive>It is my belief that new elixirs might be
derived from the <clr:0000>plant and animal life<clr:ffff>
found in <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>.
Comment_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_00>I know you... <sp:5:0:0>We met once before,
didn't we?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Yes, I remember now! <sp:5:0:0>I ran into you
after my interview with <clr:0000>Josha <clr:ffff>for the
<clr:0000>chasm-researcher position<clr:ffff>.
Quite a tough interviewer, Josha was.
I wonder who could possibly have held up
to her scrutiny.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you familiar with<clr:0000> Mercay Island<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>
A <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> was just discovered there.<sp:5:1:0>

A deep, gaping hole that's bound to be
full of undiscovered <clr:0000>plant and animal life<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I would simply love to explore it...<sp:5:1:0>were it
not a surefire way to get myself killed.
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>The best remedy for low stamina is a
good night's rest in one of the stables'
<clr:0000>Malanya beds<clr:ffff>.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Side effects may include hearing a strange voice in
your sleep...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Among the <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> that fell in the <clr:0000>Lanayru
Wetlands<clr:ffff>, there are large pieces of debris.

Apparently one structure there is so large,
you can even walk around inside it.

<sp:3:0:2:0500>It's like a gift from the sky to explorers
everywhere.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Rain covers up the sound of footsteps.<sp:5:0:0>
It's ideal for evading notice by monsters.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I came to see the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> nearby, but now
that I'm here, I think I ought to turn back.

What if I got too close and fell in?<sp:5:0:0>
I might get hurt!
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>I must admit...<sp:5:1:0>all this walking has worn me
out.<sp:5:1:0> I long for a cozy bed at the stable.

Since I'm low on stamina, I may treat
myself to a <clr:0000>Malanya bed<clr:ffff>. Then I'll wake
up good and refreshed!
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>I'll also hear a strange voice in my sleep, but that's
neither here nor there...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Among all the <clr:0000>fallen ruins <clr:ffff>in the <clr:0000>Lanayru
Wetlands<clr:ffff>, there's said to be a structure
big enough to walk around in.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>By simmering <clr:0000>bugs<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>monster parts<clr:ffff> in
a <clr:0000>pot<clr:ffff>, you can make <clr:0000>elixirs<clr:ffff> with a variety
of benefits.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Most people seem to dislike rain, but
I've always been a fan.<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0101>After all, rain covers up the sound of
footsteps. It's perfect for walking past
monsters without being noticed.
